title: How is this fair?
body:

But, buuut it's a normals game meant for fun and usually casual players don't want to be presented with an unfair challenge or advtange. They are there for fun you silly head.

{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

But that is the issue, if i want to play in a competitive environment, I'll play ranked. i know what to expect.

Why should i have to engage multiple 5man teams. and try harder in a casual mode over ranked?

the matches should be equal and even. 
5mans try-harding vs a duo and 3 solo players who could be 50/50 on mindset isn't fair.

You shouldn't have to that was my point. This dude just pussied out and deleted his comment.

looked at your history, you play in premades. I'm playing solo.  Apples and Oranges sir.

I'm playing norms, its meant to be a chill environment. but i have 5 mans try-harding when they should be in flex.
